projects.description: User clicks a button to generate a random quote.
Uses data pagination and filtering to add 9 contact cards at a time to a page, and adds navigational keys to the bottom to access the entire library of contact cards.
An interactive form that dynamically changes based on user inputs. Form also checks required fields against specific criteria before form will submit.

A word game that pulls a phrase at random from a bank of phrases. The user selects characters from the on-screen keyboard, and when the selected letter is in the secret phrase it reveals the correct letter and marks the keybarod key a different color to mark it correct. If the user is wrong it removes a heart and marks the key a color to mark it incorrect. The game ends when the user either loses all 5 hearts or correctly identifies all the letters in the hidden phrase.

The directory accessing a public API containing contact info data, and pulls the contact info of 12 random people that match criteria put into a query. The user is able to click on a contact card to open up a window that displays more information about the selected person, and then close the opened window to keep viewing the data.
A matching game with a Christmas theme. The user clicks a present to unwrap the gift inside, and tries to find a present with an identical gift. Game ends when the presents are all matched.
